html: We must return to a government that's of/for/by the people. That's why I've signed on to co-sponsor #HR1, a sweeping bill that will: - Reduce big money influence - Limit gerrymandering - End voter roll purging & increase voting rights - Expand online voter reg. + early voting
text:
We must return to a government that's of/for/by the people. That's why I've signed on to co-sponsor #HR1, a sweeping bill that will:
- Reduce big money influence 
- Limit gerrymandering
- End voter roll purging & increase voting rights
- Expand online voter reg. + early voting
